definition: extent of a rise (in prices etc)/amount of increase/growth (typically expressed as a percentage)

sentences.english: The previous report's year-over-year data showed a gain of 4 percent.
sentences.chinese: 而之前的年變化報告有4%的漲幅。

sentences.english: Mining stocks, which are especially sensitive to economic growth prospects led the gains.
sentences.chinese: 對各國經濟增長預期業尤爲敏感的礦業板塊漲幅居前。

sentences.english: Polyester market rise in the overall stability of Jiangsu and Zhejiang, one to 200 per cent.
sentences.chinese: 江浙滌絲市場整體穩中有漲，漲幅多在一至兩百。

sentences.english: Commodities especially energies were among the biggest gainers of the session.
sentences.chinese: 商品特別是能源當中漲幅居前。

sentences.english: The highest increase of Rs 27 per kg has been recorded in Thiruvananthapuram.
sentences.chinese: 特里凡得琅市創下了每公斤27盧比的最高漲幅。

sentences.english: Among sectors contributing to the positive European tone were oil and mining stocks.
sentences.chinese: 其他版塊中，原油和煤炭版塊在歐洲股市中漲幅居前。

sentences.english: The average aggreesive-growth fund has risen 29% in the past 12 months.
sentences.chinese: 高增長基金在過去一年裏平均漲幅爲29%。

sentences.english: Both the Aussie and Canadian dollars were higher overnight on interest rate expectations.
sentences.chinese: 澳元與加元一夜之間雙雙漲幅超過預期。

sentences.english: Average annual appreciation for 16 eastern cities is more than 36 percent.
sentences.chinese: 16座東部沿海城市的年均漲幅更是超過36%。

sentences.english: NEW HAVEN - Since hitting bottom in early March, the world's major stock markets have all risen dramatically.
sentences.chinese: 市場在今年三月初見底以來，都漲幅巨大。

sentences.english: This price increase is pretty much across the board.
sentences.chinese: 此次全線產品價格漲幅很大。

sentences.english: It was the Nikkei's biggest single-day gain in history.
sentences.chinese: 今天是有史以來日本股市漲幅最大的一天。

sentences.english: The just perceptible but continual increase in prices.
sentences.chinese: 物價不斷上漲，但因漲幅很小而不爲人注意。

sentences.english: The U.K.’s Prudential PLC (UK:PRU 590.00, +22.00, +3.87%) (PUK 17.89, -0.07, -0.39%) was another big riser in the insurance sector.
sentences.chinese: 英國保誠保險集團在保險板塊漲幅居前。

sentences.english: But the outlook is hazier than those gains suggest.
sentences.chinese: 但是前景並不像股票漲幅所顯示的那麼明朗。

sentences.english: The U.K.’s Prudential PLC (UK:PRU 590.00, +22.00, +3.87%) (PUK 17.89, -0.07, -0.39%)  was another big riser in the insurance sector.
sentences.chinese: 英國保誠保險集團在保險板塊漲幅居前。

definition: slab/(geology) tectonic plate/(fig.) sector (of the stock market or of industry)/(economic) bloc
to bounce/to bounce back/to boomerang/to ricochet/rebound (of stock market etc)/bounce/backlash/negative repercussions
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
